Title: Essay Brainstorming- UC Essay

Roadmap One-Line Description: Every student has a story worth telling—we’ll help you find yours to share with colleges. You’ll leave this meeting with an outline for your UC essays that are thoughtful, engaging, and even fun to write.
Content: Essay Brainstorming. Blogpost on the importance of the college essay. Letter to Parents on the essay process.
